title: Port blending and interpolation tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestIssue11 (GitHub issue about blending) and TestInterpolation (angular interpolation). Ensure blending methods are correctly tested.

title: Implement HexColor serialization
description: Port HexColor type and serialization methods from go-colorful/hexcolor.go for database/JSON/YAML support. Optional feature.

title: Implement HSLuv and HPLuv color spaces
description: Port HSLuv and HPLuv color space conversions from go-colorful/hsluv.go. Include HSLuv(), HPLuv(), DistanceHSLuv(), DistanceHPLuv() methods and corresponding constructors.

title: Port soft palette generation tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestColorCount, TestImpossibleConstraint, TestConstraint from soft_palettegen_test.go to Crystal spec.

title: Port remaining color conversion tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port missing test functions from colors_test.go: TestRgbToOkLab, TestXyzToOkLab, TestOklabToXyz, TestOkLabToOkLch, TestOkLchToOkLab, TestMakeColor, and any other missing tests.

title: Implement color sorting
description: Port color sorting functionality from go-colorful/sort.go. Include Sorted() function using CIEDE2000 distance and minimum spanning tree.

title: Port color sorting tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestSortSimple from sort_test.go to Crystal spec.

title: Implement soft palette generation
description: Port soft palette generation from go-colorful/soft_palettegen.go. Include SoftPalette(), SoftPaletteEx(), SoftPaletteWithRand() functions.

title: Port go-colorful tests to Crystal specs
description: Port test files from vendor/go-colorful to Crystal spec files. Include colors_test.go, hexcolor_test.go, hsluv_test.go, etc.

title: Port core color struct and conversions from go-colorful
Port color generator tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestColorValidity from colorgens_test.go to Crystal spec.

title: Implement OkLab and OkLch color spaces
description: Port OkLab and OkLch color space conversions from go-colorful/colors.go. Include OkLab(), OkLch(), BlendOkLab(), BlendOkLch() methods.

title: Implement LuvLCh color space
description: Port LuvLCh color space conversions from go-colorful/colors.go. Include LuvLCh(), LuvLChWhiteRef(), BlendLuvLCh() methods.

title: Port HSLuv tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestHSLuv from hsluv_test.go to Crystal spec. Ensure HSLuv/HPLuv conversions are tested.

title: Implement color generators
description: Port color generation functions from go-colorful/colorgens.go and warm_palettegen.go, happy_palettegen.go. Include WarmColor(), HappyColor(), FastWarmColor(), FastHappyColor() with and without RandInterface.

title: Port hexcolor tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestHexColor and TestHexColorCompositeJson from hexcolor_test.go to Crystal spec. Test HexColor serialization.

title: Implement MakeColor conversions
description: Port MakeColor function from go-colorful/colors.go to convert from various color types (RGBA, NRGBA, Gray, Gray16) with alpha handling.

title: Port distance calculation tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestLabDistance, TestCIE94Distance, TestCIEDE2000Distance from colors_test.go. Include dists table with ground-truth values from Bruce Lindbloom.

title: Port fast linear RGB approximation tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestFastLinearRgb with eps tolerance of 6/255. Ensure fast approximation is 'good enough'.
